QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Redridge Mountains!
QuestData.Description: While the situation here is dire, other parts of the region are literally quaking from the great upheaval.$B$BI have here a report from Watch Captain Parker of Redridge Mountains, one of our territories east of Elwynn Forest. He is asking for a hero to come to their aid.$B$BWe are spread so thin here that I don't know how we can afford to send anymore military. Would you check on Parker and see what he needs? You will find Watch Captain Parker atop the tower at Three Corners.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Watch Captain Parker at Tower Watch in Redridge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Heard Westfall was in some deep doody.$B$B<Parker doesn't even turn to face you.>$B$BWell, we got our own set of problems here. See them gnolls out there? Looks like they're actin' up again. I don't like it. Don't like it one bit.
